attributes.action: Bring Council exchanges and Tenancies in line with the private sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tenants of Local Authorities wanting to exchange or accept a council property do so blindly through lack of information as to Neighbour disputes, and what the area is like. When buying a house it is the law that you must disclose these issues. We would wish for these same issues to be afforded to Council and Housing Association tenants.
